title: Easy Rentals
description: A property renting web platform. Implemented secure user authentication with JWT and cookies, real-time chat with Socket.io, and used MongoDB for storing property listings and user data. Built REST APIs, front-end integration, and backend logic.

title: Transactional Data Stream
description: Real-time data streaming pipeline for IRCTC mock data using Google Pub/Sub and BigQuery. Developed Python-based ETL scripts for high-velocity streaming data, optimized ingestion for low latency and high throughput, and ensured data integrity with Pub/Sub acknowledgments.

title: Multiple Sclerosis Disease Prediction
description: Built a predictive model for diagnosing multiple sclerosis using machine learning. Implemented preprocessing, feature selection, and model evaluation. Used various ML models to identify key predictors with high accuracy.

title: React Spreadsheet
description: A web-based spreadsheet application built with React, supporting real-time editing and collaboration. Designed for fast, intuitive data entry and manipulation.
